movie.title: The Look of Love
movie.plot: Paul Raymond builds a porn, entertainment and real estate empire that makes him the wealthiest man in Britain, but drugs doom his beloved daughter, Debbie.

events.title: Paul Raymond's daughter Debbie dies of a heroin overdose
